name: EspNowCam
description: ESPNowCam, a straightforward video streamer for popular ESP32Cam models, leveraging the ESPNow protocol. No need for IPs, routers, or credentialsâ€”keeping it simple! :D ESPNowCam supports ESP32 Cameras and displays. **This library is for general purpose**, as it receives pointers to data, such as buffers, strings, images, or any byte-formatted content. This versatility allows you to transmit larger packages.
